Text:
Orlando Weekly Credit: Photo via Sprinkle Cupcake ATM Facebook pageThe next best thing after an ATM filled with money is an ATM filled with cupcakes, and pretty soon Tampa will have both. The Tampa Bay Times reports Beverly Hills company Sprinkles Cupcakes is opening its first bakery and cupcake ATM in Tampa later this spring, making it the first location in Florida. The company’s invention went viral after the first cupcake ATM opened in 2012. This article appears in Feb 24 – Mar 1, 2016.
